1532321.content: You think to yourself, " I wish I was Anna's brain." Suddenly, you perspective changes as you look out of Anna eyes through her optic nerve. You can't really move, but then you think, " well, I am her brain, she's got no choice but to do what I say!" You debate what to do next.

choices: her whole body(but not her mind and soul)
